name: Flora Defense
description:
Flora Defense is a game about using a range of fantasy plant life and magical adaptions or improvements to defend against hostile forces.

Flora Defense has been released in an early access form to gather support and to allow the community to have input on development and on what's fun or not fun. There are some features and content missing that will be added over time. It is currently playable and has several hours of content.

Current features

  • Tile based Tower Defense with a focus on strategic placement of defense & support
  • Enemies that fight back! Harder Enemies will appear over time, increasing the pressure
  • Persistent upgrades that can be unlocked as the player  gains levels
  • Level up plants with an eye on your economy, some plants cost resources to sustain
  • Tile system supports spreading of positive and negative Influences affecting plants in the area
  • Plants that can provide buffs and synergy with a variety of combinations to try
  • Possibility of limited mazing using the Trunkwall plant, some enemies will attack the wall if it looks easier to break through than run around
  • Customize difficulty options with appropriate reward increases

Upcoming features, in no specific order

  • Sound effects
  • A random power gain system that will work alongside leveling up plants;
    provide buffs or abilities to a specific plant or tile
  • New enemies with different targeting priorities, ranges, abilities
  • More options for difficulty customization
  • More plant adaptions and upgrades
  • Unique visual assets for plant adaptions
